label: ID
description: TJET Amnesty ID

label: Description
description: Name and/or description of the amnesty (click for coding sources)

label: Year
description: Year the amnesty was passed or announced

label: Type
description: Was this amnesty passed to address democratic transition or conflict?

label: Recipients
description: Who were the intended recipients of the reparations policy?

label: ID
description: TJET Trial ID

label: Trial Type
description: Type of trial (domestic, international, hybrid, or foreign)

label: Description
description: Trial description (click for coding sources)

label: Accused Records
description: Number of accused records for trial (expand for more detail)

label: Year
description: Year the trial began

label: SGBV
description: Did this trial involve charges of sexual or gender-based violence?

label: Subtype
description: Was this post-autocratic transitional justice or conflict justice?

label: Subtype
description: What was the basis for jurisdiction of this foreign prosecution?

label: Subtype
description: Legal system in which this trial was held

label: Accused ID
description: TJET Accused ID

label: ID
description: TJET Trial ID

label: Trial Type
description: Type of trial (domestic, international, hybrid, or foreign)

label: Name or Description
description: Name or description of the accused (click for coding sources)

label: State Agent
description: Was the accused a state agent?

label: High Rank
description: Was the accused of high rank?

label: Ever Convicted
description: Was the accused ever convicted in this trial?

label: ID
description: TJET Reparation ID

label: Name
description: Name or description of the reparations policy (click for coding sources)

label: Year
description: Year the reparation policy was passed

label: Type
description: Was this post-autocratic transitional justice or conflict justice?

label: SGBV
description: Did this reparation policy specifically address sexual or gender-based justice?

label: Intended Recipients
description: Who were the intended recipients of this reparations policy?

label: ID
description: TJET Truth Commission ID

label: Name
description: Name or description of the truth commission (click for coding sources)

label: Year
description: Year the truth commission was mandated

label: Type
description: Was this post-autocratic transitional justice or conflict justice?

label: SGBV
description: Was this truth commission mandated to address sexual or gender-based violence?

label: Report
description: Did the truth commission issue a final report? If available, an electronic copy is hyperlinked

label: ID
description: TJET Vetting ID

label: Name
description: Name or description of the vetting policy (click for coding sources)

label: Year
description: Year the vetting policy was initiated

label: Type
description: Was this post-autocratic transitional justice or conflict justice?

label: Targets
description: Which institutional actors were targeted in the vetting policy?

label: Mandate
description: Mandating Authority/Document

label: Years
description: Years when investigation was ongoing

label: Support International Prosecutions
description: Did the investigation aim to support international prosecutions?

label: Collect Evidence
description: Did the investigation aim to collect evidence for possible future prosecutions?

label: Encourage Domestic Prosecutions
description: Did the investigation aim to encourage prosecutions?

description: UCDP intensity classification: conflict (at least 25 battle-related deaths per year) or war (at least 1000 battle-related deaths per year)
